DOC.brief_summary: This study determine effect posture time go test . Half subject assume high-power posture , half assume low-power posture .
DOC.criteria: male female , age 18 65 , 4 extremity intact , ability stand still 20 second . unable stand foot together one foot apart least 20 second , unable wrap arm around torso keep hand hips 20 second , unable perform sit stand transfer ambulation independently , cognitive impairment interfere experimental procedure .
